name: Wild Squirrel Simulator 3D
description:
Become a wild squirrel – graceful and cute animal! Enjoy the wilderness, run across the woods, jump from tree to tree, communicate other animals, mate with females and raise up cubs! Have fun with Wild Squirrel Simulator 3D!
Live the life of a real male or female squirrel with our animal survival simulator! Behave as a real adult red squirrel – struggle against your opponents, search for food (nuts. for example), mate with the other squirrels, and take care ‘bout cubs. Fight for your life against predators - earn experience and level up your skills to learn new attacks! Also, you can use earned points to customize your squirrel and change the color of its fur – check different color schemes and try to be a red squirrel, Yucatan squirrel, black squirrel, fox squirrel and others.
Explore this unfriendly wilderness, full of different animals – some of them could become your friends, but others are your direct rivals, or – even worse – the predators! Mind your hunger and health indicators – if one of them drops, your chances to survive would fell too. Eat plenty of food, drink enough water and collect coins and buy power-ups – it could help you to survive in the hostile world of this animal survival simulator!
Search for food, run over plains and forests, struggle other rodents and predators! Start your own wild adventure and be the real wild squirrel with Wild Squirrel Simulator 3D!
Wild Squirrel Simulator 3D features
Ultimate wild squirrel simulator!
Full customization of your rodent
Hideous and aggressive predators as your enemies
Ability to mate and raise up cubs
Amazing 3D graphics
Feel as a little rodent surviving in the cruel northern forests and plains with Wild Squirrel Simulator
